rewards.reward: Couple bucks in the tip jar. Awesome! This will make you eligible for any digital rewards that all backers receive. We'll put you on our mailing list and you'll receive all updates.

Digital poster of our main characters holding a THANK YOU sign with your first name written in Cherokee (digital download).\r\nYour pledge will indirectly benefit the revitalization of all indigenous languages.

Supplementary App -  You will receive a separate App for mobile devices that teaches all the entries in the game (using audio, images and spellings). Features: Record your voice, search function, 3 game difficulties and 3 types of quizzes. The app will work on iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android phones and Android tablets. Besides being able to study in an immersion environment with our 3D characters, this app will help you to study the language on-the-go.
Just the first level (Level 1) of either Talking Games: Cherokee, or Talking Games: Spanish (digital download for PC or Mac). Just in time for Christmas!
First two levels (Levels 1&2) of either Talking Games: Cherokee or Talking Games: Spanish (digital download for Mac)

Either: Talking Games - Cherokee (for PC/Mac) or Talking Games Spanish (digital download for PC/Mac)\r\nPlus\r\nSupplementary App - You will receive a separate App for mobile devices that teaches all the entries in the game (using audio, images and spellings). Features: Record your voice, search function, 3 game difficulties and 3 types of quizzes. The app will work on iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android phones and Android tablets. Besides being able to study in an immersion environment with our 3D characters, this app will help you to study the language on-the-go.

PREMIUM In-Game Ads! 
Select from ONE of the three choices. 

1) Name an entire building in the game! How about: “Buddy T's Pizza Palace”? "Nevada Corporation"? Use your imagination (subject to guidelines). Give us your input on the planning of the game. 

2) A personal or business billboard (or indoor ad) in a prominent place. Viewable when Character drive or walk past it during gameplay (subject to guidelines). Give us your input on the planning of the game. 

3) Spend the day with us in Las Vegas (2 persons). Personalized tour of the city. Give us your input on the planning of the game. Must pay for own travel expenses to Las Vegas. 

PLUS ALL THE FOLLOWING: (Level 1 - 8 game) (PC or Mac) and all digital gifts. Your name or company name prominently displayed in the credits. A Personalized video THANK YOU from Indian Elvis himself!
